law.catch_line: Power to select make of machine.
law.text: The fiscal court of any county may select in its discretion any type and make of voting machine that complies with the specifications and requirements of this chapter. The fiscal court may employ engineers and other skilled persons to advise and aid in the selection of the machines and in determining the specifications thereof.
law.history: Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 130, sec. 25, effective June 21, 1974.
